name: Immortal Saga
description:
Immortal Saga is a Strategy RPG that is heavily inspired by the Fire Emblem  series. It follows the continent spanning story of a young lords quest to save her father from imprisonment and bring justice back to her lands.

As this game is in Beta only Part 1 of the game is playable currently however the second and final part will be coming soon! 

Special thanks to Steve Mariani who graciously made music for this game such as the Title Theme and Ending Credits Theme! If you want to donate to him here is his paypal:  Steve's Paypal!

If you want to discuss the game, please join our Discord server! It's a great place to come in and discuss as well as report all those fun bugs in the game:

Discord!

Follow me on Twitter for updates! : Twitter!

DOWNLOAD THE ITCH.IO APP TO INSTALL THE GAME AND GET AUTOMATIC UPDATES!!
